channel.title: 2018 Appreciation Thread
channel.description:
**Thank you to all the devs/contributors that made Whonix possible for another year!!**
I am grateful that you have all spent the time and effort to make a system that has greatly improved my personal level of anonymity and security.
I'd also like to thank everyone involved with providing excellent user support both here and in other channels.
I hope everyone has a happy new year. If you are also a user that is grateful for Whonix, please consider [donating](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Payments).
